sentences.en: A descendant of Yan Emperor in ancient mythology of China.
sentences.cn: 中国古代神话中炎帝的后代.

sentences.en: a lineal descendant of the company's founder
sentences.cn: 公司创始人的直系后裔

sentences.en: He calls himself a descendant of Asians, which I don't believe.
sentences.cn: 他是称自己是亚裔, 可我觉得不像.

sentences.en: He is a descendant of Confucius.
He is a direct descendant of the author of this book.
sentences.cn: 他是这本书作者的直系后裔.

sentences.en: He is a lineal descendant of the company's founder.
sentences.cn: 他是公司创始人的直系后裔。

sentences.en: He is a worthy descendant of the working class.
sentences.cn: 他是工人阶级的好后代.

sentences.en: He was a direct descendant of Napoleon Bonaparte.
sentences.cn: 他是拿破仑·波拿巴的嫡系后裔。

sentences.en: He was an O'Conor and a direct descendant of the last High King of Ireland.
sentences.cn: 他属于奥康纳家族，是爱尔兰最后一位君王的嫡系后裔。

sentences.en: Holgrave confesses that he is a descendant of the Maule family.
sentences.cn: 霍尔格拉夫承认自己是莫尔家族的后裔.

sentences.en: I want the triumph of seeing my descendant fairly lord of their estates.
sentences.cn: 我愿意胜利地看见我的后代很堂皇地作他们的产业的主人.

sentences.en: If you must use descendant selectors, prefer child selectors, which at least only require evaluation of one additional node, not all the intermediate nodes up to an ancestor.
sentences.cn: 如果您必须使用后代选择器，尽量使用子代选择器，这最少只需评估一个额外的节点，而非中间直至祖先的所有节点。

sentences.en: She is a direct descendant of Queen Victoria.
sentences.cn: 她是维多利亚女王的嫡系后代。

sentences.en: She is a direct descendant of the former King of Wales.
sentences.cn: 她是前威尔士国王的直系后代.

sentences.en: The guy claims to be a direct descendant of Mozart.
sentences.cn: 这个男人自称是莫扎特的直系后代.

sentences.en: Why does few people know he is the president's descendant?
sentences.cn: 为什么很少有人知道他的 “ 存在”?

words.tran_cn: 下降物；下降者；下行字母
下降；下去；下来；遗传；屈尊
除去…的气味；使…失去香味

trans.tran_en: someone who is related to a person who lived a long time ago, or to a family, group of people etc that existed in the past
